Appreciation

html: @shreyaghoshal Mesmerising, soulful, divine Mumbai concert! Feeling blessed! More than 3 hours of musical pilgrimage..blend of old n new melodies appreciated by generations of all age..my 4th consecutive SG concert..hope to hear u soon ma'am!! Thank you and stay blessed!!
